rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRTESTCD

datasetVariables.description: Short name of the TEST in TRTEST. TRTESTCD cannot contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores. Examples: TUMSTATE, DIAMETER. See Assumption 2.
datasetVariables.label: Tumor Assessment Short Name
datasetVariables.name: TRTESTCD

modelClassVariable.title: Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRTEST

datasetVariables.description: Verbatim name of the test or examination used to obtain the measurement or finding. The value in TRTEST cannot be longer than 40 characters. Examples: Tumor State, Diameter, Longest Perpendicular diameter, Volume, Area. See Assumption 2.
datasetVariables.label: Tumor Assessment Test Name
datasetVariables.name: TRTEST

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Standard Format

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRSTRESC

datasetVariables.description: Contains the result value for all findings, copied or derived from TRORRES in a standard format or standard units. TRSTRESC should store all results or findings in character format; if results are numeric, they should also be stored in numeric format in TRSTRESN
datasetVariables.label: Character Result/Finding in Std Format
datasetVariables.name: TRSTRESC

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRSTRESN

datasetVariables.description: Used for continuous or numeric results or findings in standard format; copied in numeric format from TRSTRESC. TRSTRESN should store all numeric test results or findings.
datasetVariables.label: Numeric Result/Finding in Standard Units
datasetVariables.name: TRSTRESN

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRSTRESU

datasetVariables.description: Standardized unit used for TRSTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Standard Units
datasetVariables.name: TRSTRESU

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66789

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRSTAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to indicate a scan/image/physical exam was not performed or a tumor measurement was not taken. Should be Null if a result exists in TRORRES.
datasetVariables.label: Completion Status
datasetVariables.name: TRSTAT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRREASND

datasetVariables.description: Describes why a scan/image/physical exam was not performed or a tumor measurement was not taken. Examples: SCAN NOT PERFORMED, NOT ASSESSABLE: Image obscured, TUMOR. Used in conjunction with TRSTAT when value is NOT DONE.
datasetVariables.label: Reason Tumor Measurement Not Performed
datasetVariables.name: TRREASND

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRNAM

datasetVariables.description: The name or identifier of the vendor that performed the Tumor measurement or assessment. This column can be left Null when the Investigator provides the complete set of data in the domain.
datasetVariables.label: Vendor Name
datasetVariables.name: TRNAM

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C85492

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

priorVersion.title: Method used to identify the Tumor

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRMETHOD

self.title: Method used to Identify the Tumor

datasetVariables.description: Method used to measure the tumor. Examples: MRI, CT SCAN.
datasetVariables.label: Method used to Identify the Tumor
datasetVariables.name: TRMETHOD

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C78735

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TREVAL

datasetVariables.description: Role of the person who provided the evaluation. Examples: INVESTIGATOR, INDEPENDENT ASSESSOR.  This column can be left Null when the Investigator provides the complete set of data in the domain. However the column should contain no Null values when data from one or more independent assessors is included meaning that the rows attributed to the Investigator should contain a value of INVESTIGATOR.
datasetVariables.label: Evaluator
datasetVariables.name: TREVAL

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C96777

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TREVALID

datasetVariables.description: The Evaluator Specified variable is used in conjunction with TREVAL to provide an additional level of detail. When multiple assessors play the role identified in TREVAL, values of TREVALID will attribute a row of data to a particular assessor. TREVALID should not contain the names of the assessors, or a code identifier for a specific assessor, but should contain values such as RADIOLOGIST, RADIOLOGIST 1 or RADIOLOGIST 2. The TREVALID variable is subject to CDISC Controlled Terminology. Note TREVAL must also be populated when TREVALID is populated. See Assumption 7.
datasetVariables.label: Evaluator Identifier
datasetVariables.name: TREVALID

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRACPTFL

datasetVariables.description: In cases where more than one independent assessor (e.g. RADIOLOGIST 1, RADIOLOGIST 2, ADJUDICATOR) provide independent assessments at the same timepoint this flag identifies the record that is considered to be the accepted assessment.
datasetVariables.label: Accepted Record Flag
datasetVariables.name: TRACPTFL

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.VISITNUM

datasetVariables.description: 1. Clinical encounter number.  2. Numeric version of VISIT, used for sorting.
datasetVariables.label: Visit Number
datasetVariables.name: VISITNUM

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.VISIT

datasetVariables.description: 1. Protocol-defined description of clinical encounter.  2. May be used in addition to VISITNUM and/or VISITDY.
datasetVariables.label: Visit Name
datasetVariables.name: VISIT

datasetVariables.label: Epoch
datasetVariables.name: EPOCH

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRDTC

datasetVariables.description: TRDTC variable represents the date of the scan/image/physical exam not the date that the image was read to identify tumors. TRDTC variable does not represent the VISIT date.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time of Tumor Measurement
datasetVariables.name: TRDTC

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.2 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRDY

datasetVariables.description: 1. Study day of the scan/image/physical exam, measured as integer days.  2. Algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC variable in Demographics.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of Tumor Measurement
datasetVariables.name: TRDY

description: A findings domain that represents quantitative measurements and/or qualitative assessments of the tumors or lesions identified in the tumor/lesion identification (TU) domain. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C106578, 2018-06-29)
label: Tumor Results
name: TR
